trans-unit.source: Represents a parameter used in EntityCommand.
No content here will be updated; please do not add material here.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter"></xref> class using the default values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter"></xref> class using the specified parameter name and data type.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter"></xref> class using the specified parameter name, data type and size.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
The size of the parameter.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter"></xref> class using the specified properties.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
The size of the parameter.
The name of the source column.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter"></xref> class using the specified properties.
The name of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
The size of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> values.
`true` to indicate that the parameter accepts null values; otherwise, `false`.
The number of digits used to represent the value.
The number of decimal places to which value is resolved.
The name of the source column.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> values.
The value of the parameter.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.DbType"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the direction of the parameter.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.ParameterDirection"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the type of the parameter, expressed as an EdmType.
May be null (which is what it will be if unset).
This means that the DbType contains all the type information.
Non-null values must not contradict DbType (only restate or specialize).
The type of the parameter, expressed as an EdmType.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the parameter accepts null values.
`true` if null values are accepted; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the name of the entity parameter.
The name of the entity parameter.
Gets or sets the number of digits used to represent the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter.Value"></xref> property.
The number of digits used to represent the value.
Resets the type associated with the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter"></xref>.
Gets or sets the number of decimal places to which <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter.Value"></xref> is resolved.
The number of decimal places to which value is resolved.
Gets or sets the maximum size of the data within the column.
The maximum size of the data within the column.

Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> and used for loading or returning the <xref href="System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter.Value"></xref>.
The name of the source column mapped to the dataset and used for loading or returning the value.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether source column is nullable.
`true` if source column is nullable; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> to use when loading the value.
One of the <xref href="System.Data.DataRowVersion"></xref> values.
Returns a string representation of the parameter.
A string representation of the parameter.
Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
The value of the parameter.
